command.name: add-test
command.title: Add a new test package to the application
command.help:
The test framework consists of a set of test cases that are registered in a testsuite. A test harness allows to execute the tests registered in the testsuite. This command generates the test harness, testsuite framework and a test case for the module. The following files are created:
tests.gpr.in regtests/<project>_harness.adb regtests/<project>-testsuite.ads regtests/<project>-testsuite.adb regtests/<project>-<module>-tests.ads regtests/<project>-<module>-tests.adb
When a new test is added, the project testsuite (<project>-testsuite.adb) is updated to add the new tests in the testsuite (returned by the Suite function).
